import React,{useState}from"react";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Login=_ref=>{let{setUser}=_ref;const[role,setRole]=useState("learner");const[email,setEmail]=useState("");const[password,setPassword]=useState("");const navigate=useNavigate();const handleLogin=e=>{e.preventDefault();// User data object
const userData={email,role};// Store logged-in user in localStorage
localStorage.setItem("user",JSON.stringify(userData));setUser(userData);// Retrieve existing logged-in users list from localStorage
let loggedInUsers=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("loggedInUsers"))||[];// Avoid duplicate entries
if(!loggedInUsers.some(user=>user.email===email)){loggedInUsers.push(userData);localStorage.setItem("loggedInUsers",JSON.stringify(loggedInUsers));}// Redirect based on role
if(role==="admin"){navigate("/admin");}else if(role==="instructor"){navigate("/instructor-dashboard");}else{navigate("/dashboard");}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex flex-col items-center justify-center min-h-screen",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-2xl font-bold mb-4",children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleLogin,className:"bg-white p-6 rounded shadow-md",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",placeholder:"Email",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),required:true,className:"block w-full p-2 border rounded mb-2"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"Password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),required:true,className:"block w-full p-2 border rounded mb-2"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{className:"block mb-1",children:"Select Role:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("select",{value:role,onChange:e=>setRole(e.target.value),className:"block w-full p-2 border rounded mb-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"learner",children:"Learner"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"instructor",children:"Instructor"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"admin",children:"Admin"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"bg-blue-500 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded",children:"Login"})]})]});};export default Login;
